XmlInterface Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for XmlInterface:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A xml interface to avoid complications when the php version is changed in website.

Usage example : $base1 = new XmlInterface; $base1->id_requete; // Pas de $

Parameters:
$fn The filename of the xmlfile

XmlInterface::getElementsByTagName ( $  tagname  ) 

Return a list of element by their tag name

To have all the Player xml elements, call getElementsByTagName('Player')

Parameters:
$tagname The XML element name
Returns:
A list of element

XmlInterface::getChildText ( $  node,
$  childtag 
)

Return the text of the child node or "" if not found

To get the name of a Player (in a Name element). Call getChildText($playerNode, 'Name')

Parameters:
$node The parent node
$childtag The xml tagname of the child
Returns:
The content of the child

XmlInterface::addElementToRoot ( $  nodeName  ) 

Create and append a new child to root and return it

If you call addElementToRoot('Player'), you will have a PLayer node directly under the root xml element.

Parameters:
$nodeName The tag name of the new element
Returns:
The new element

$  nodeText

$  nodeName 
)

$  attrbName,
$  attrbVal 
)

Set a new attribute and its value to an existing node
